name: connectivity
description: Analyzes network paths between AWS resources using VPC Reachability Analyzer and can automatically fix issues by applying security group rules. Supports both EC2 instance IDs and IP addresses. Use dns-resolve tool first if working with DNS names.

query.description: Natural language query describing the connectivity analysis or fix request

source_resource.description: Source resource identifier (EC2 instance ID like i-1234567890abcdef0 or IP address like 10.0.1.100)

destination_resource.description: Destination resource identifier (EC2 instance ID like i-0987654321fedcba0 or IP address like 10.0.2.200)

action.description: Action to perform: 'check' to analyze connectivity only, 'fix' to analyze and apply fixes if issues found (requires user consent)

session_id.description: Session ID for agent memory tracking (optional)
